tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dashboard_data (
    dashboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT,
    indicator_id INT,
    date DATE,
    value DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES financial_metrics(metric_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (indicator_id) REFERENCES performance_indicators(indicator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dashboard_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT,
    indicator_id INT,
    data_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    data_date DATE
);
